name: Rime Worm
description: The Rime Worm is a large elemental creature embodying the harshness of winter, with an icy body that deals cold damage to attackers. It navigates through icy terrains effortlessly.
memorable: It can petrify foes in ice, making it a formidable enemy in icy landscapes.
goals: To dominate in icy habitats, ambushing unsuspecting creatures.
relations: Typically found in frigid regions, it may share environments with other cold-based creatures.
environment: Icy environments, such as snowy landscapes and frozen grounds.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution, immunity to cold damage, and abilities that control the battlefield.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma, making it limited in social interactions.
attacks: Makes two Rime Tendril attacks dealing bludgeoning and cold damage, can grapple foes, and has an area attack with Black Ice Spray.
most_powerful_ability: Freeze Prey, which can petrify a grappled target with cold effects.
skills: Proficient in Stealth checks in snowy terrain, giving it an advantage for hiding.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water.
Imposes difficult terrain with its Black Ice Spray ability.
Burrows through snow and ice without penalty.
test_queries: creature that can petrify enemies with ice
